remarks: A method for computing restricted iota.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
riota5f.1 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) $.
riota5f.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
riota5f.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps <-> x = B ) ) $.
riota5f $p |- ( ph -> ( iota_ x e. A ps ) = B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
